meanings.definition: To act together or in conjunction with another
meanings.sent1: The team coacts to finish the project on time.
meanings.sent2: The dancers coacts beautifully in their performance.
meanings.sent3: The animals coacts to escape from the zoo.
meanings.sent4: The waves coacts with the wind to create a powerful storm.
meanings.sent5: The students coacts to organize a successful fundraiser.

meanings.definition: To work together towards a common goal
meanings.sent1: The friends coacts to plan a surprise party for their teacher.
meanings.sent2: The countries coacts to address the issue of climate change.
meanings.sent3: The vegetables coacts to escape from the salad bowl.
meanings.sent4: The gears in the machine coacts smoothly to produce energy.
meanings.sent5: The ants coacts to build an intricate underground colony.
